short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get word suggestions that work in wordle!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a addon specifically for the Wordle website. What it does is adds an element to the page that shows recommendations based on the words that they have entered as well as suggestions when they first load the page. This is meant to be used to aid the user in solving Wordles daily word puzzles.
